alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 2:26PM CDT until June 15 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Bradley County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 325 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lakesite, or 11 miles northeast of Chattanooga, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Soddy-Daisy, Lakesite, South Cleveland, Harrison, East Cleveland, Wildwood Lake, Collegedale and Waterville. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 9 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
